title: Meet Our Cousins: Afflicted
itunes:title: Meet Our Cousins: Afflicted
itunes:subtitle: Afflicted is a horror thriller audio drama best described as Lovecraft Country meets True Blood, told in an anthology format like American Horror Story.
description:
Afflicted is a horror thriller audio drama best described as Lovecraft Country meets True Blood, told in an anthology format like American Horror Story.


All seasons will feature characters who use the hoodoo belief system, and a demonic book bound in human flesh that wreaks havoc wherever it goes. Season 1 focuses on a small, East Texas town that suffers impossible natural disasters, and only the town's shunned hoodoo queen can save the town and its citizens, but will the fearful, overly religious citizens ensure their own demise?


Afflicted's creators plan to premiere on Halloween 2022, but only if they can pay everyone a fair wage.


So please support the show! Check them out on Indiegogo at www.indiegogo.com/projects/afflicted-a-horror-thriller-audio-drama and pledge to help make the next great audio drama a reality.

Get Build Mama a Coffin, Black Mouthed Dog and other exclusive content on Patreon!

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/old-gods-of-appalachia.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
